reviews.sentence: Twice yearly visit to what used to be home. Have stayed here several times enjoy the location walkable to the mall lots of great restaurants and shops also love the hotels free covered parking valet is also offered but you really do not need that. VERY nice people at the front desk. My only suggestion to this Hyat is to install grab bars in the tub shower combination.

Quick stay in Valencia. We wanted to spend a day. Magic mountain amusement park. So that is why we picked this location. Very close to the park. We booked a king room and the front desk accidentally placed us in a queen double. Luckily they still had a king room and we were able to switch out. A beautiful mall is within walking distance as well as many fine eateries. Bed was nice and comfy. a C worked great. Room was spacious. Only downside was fan in bathroom did not work and no laundry room onsite only send out laundry.

Nice clean hotel. The parking was very close with plenty of stores and restaurants within walking distance. Our room which faced the street was very noisy until late in the evening. The rooms that face the pool or golf course are quieter. Convenient location and staff The parking was very close and free with plenty of stores and restaurants within walking distance Noise reduction.

Love how this place is close to six flags and it is clean and has cold ac and free wifi and free self parking. It just need to be renovated because the building looks old and I hate how the pool is dirty and no free breakfast but other than that the employees are nice and great place to stay for a quick vacation or just to relax.

Nice comfortable hotel in a great part of town. Hotel is located in a beautiful part of town. I usually prefer the hyat place brand as they include scrumptious complimentary breakfast however there are lots of nearby shops and restaurants within walking distance. The parking is directly across from the hotel and is free. The rooms were spacious and the bedding was very comfortable. No microwave in the rooms though. I would stay here again in the future.
very nice hotel ease of parking centrally located good restaurants in walking distance.

Would stay here again. Location was very convenient to Six Flags in Valencia Ca. Surrounding neighborhood was pretty upscale. Checking in was quick and easy. I immediately received excellent customer service from Mauricio upon check in at the front desk. Parking was free and easily accessible and a covered parking at that and wi fi was free as well. My wife quickly noted the cleanliness of the room. Would definitely recommend.

Christmas with family. Excellent service and accommodations. Unloading loading and parking garage accommodation were well organized and very convenient. Our stay at the Hyat could not have been more pleasant. We have stayed at the Hyat during the last three Christmas and all three were outstanding.

Very Nice Hotel. Wonderful location with lots of shopping around. The parking garage made for easy convenient on site and free parking. The staff was accommodating by assigning our rooms adjoining as requested. Nice clean hotel rooms with a refrigerator and large flat screen TV. We would definitely stay here again. The lighting in the bathroom was poor mainly due to a ceiling light out. The tub did not drain well either.

Magic Mountain stay. Had a great time staying at this location. Parking is a breeze and they have a free shuttle to Magic Mountain. Rooms were nice and the bed was comfy. Pool and Jacuzi were perfect. Vanessa front desk clerk and Taylor manager were great. Due to a glitch in the Hyat reservation system my room was canceled. Vanessa was so very polite while she worked on the situation. Everything ended up working out just fine. Once we were settled in Vanessa sent us freshly baked cookies comped us breakfast the next day and with it all a hand written note.

Stolen items in our luggage in the valet parking. We used we use their valet parking valet parking and we are going on a cruise the next day so only brought in our overnight items and thought valet was safest and my brother going on same trip did not use valet. in the morning opened the back of car to throw in overnight bags when valet brought up our car only to find our suitcases were opened and items once we unloaded our stuff on cruise ship stolen Michael Kohrs watches gold jewelry and a Louis Vuiton purse stolen. Thankfully no money was left in bags. What was really disappointing though was the way they took the clothes out about that did not look like they ransacked I will manage so it look like they were employees that took everything out neatly but just never got a chance to put everything back in neatly. Poor Management too because on duty manager would not even come out. I would not encourage anyone to leave your vehicle with their valet service.

A better hotel stay. A wonderful and great experience. The staff is very attentive and professional. I woke up and I needed to get some vitamins in CVS and found a flat tire in the rental car I had. I parked the car outside of the garage and went to the hotels front desk to ask for help. Vanessa made the call to the rental agency and helped me with all the details to resolve my problem.

Kitchen flooded it is the closest hotel to me. We had to move out of our house for three nights. I spent two at the Hyat. What would have made this a 5 star stay. A coffee maker in the room. The first night I filled out the Room Service Request for 1 bowl of Oatmeal and a small pot of coffee. It was delivered promtply at 730 am as requested for 280 including tip. RealyAl I really want when I wake up is a cup of coffee. it is about the comfort of your guests and meeting their needs. Other hotels do a better job. I moved to the Hilton Garden Inn for the third night of being moved out. Hyat really is not anything special in todays market of competitive hotel offerings. it is nice and clean. Very central to all things in Valencia. Self parking or Valet makes it easy to get in and out. COFFEE MAKERS NEEDED IN THE ROOMS.

do not Judge A Book By Its Cover. My family and I took a road trip and wanted to stay at a nice hotel. When we arrived at 10 PM we were greeted with a group of revellers blocking the only remaining narrow driveway. The valet staff did the usual putting a lot of fancy and nice cars out front so many that they were blocking anyone and everyone from entering to check in all red zones etc filled with parked cars. After a few minutes we got our stuff off the car but I was not allowed to check in as my car was blocking the driveway I was told. I went to park the car. 15 minutes later I arrive in the lobby to learn the front desk would not check my family in until I arrived. When I did arrive the front desk guy was so occupied with phone calls he could not check us in. I understand that to finish the call your on makes sense. But to take two more calls with a tired family standing in front of you for the last 20 minutes is just rude. when is he did check us in it was cold and clinical and he offered no assistance or asked if we wanted any help. We wandered a bit pushing the hotel cart looking for the elevator. We finally get to our room and we climb in bed only to hear the coming and going if more party goers. This kept going until 3AM. No help from staff to quiet the other guests. We get ready to leave at 8AM and when we get to the lobby there are cops everywhere. What. I was told to go back to my room and wait. We went back and the view from our room was startling. Over 20 cop cars police everywhere.

Luxury Privacy and Comfort in a perfect location. This hotel is amazing beautiful well kept quiet private and positioned right in the middle of an awesome part of Santa Clarita. And the price is really good. I have read other reviews and there are a few people who gave this hotel a one star I can not speak to their individual experiences but I really struggle to understand how anyone could give this hotel a three star rating let alone a one star rating. Gorgeous luxury rooms with great amenities. Fantastic hotel restaurants with great food and great live music. Very nice staff. Positioned in the middle of the outdoor mall great restaurants shopping IMAX Theater etc. The parking should be included with every stay. 10 for each overnight is ridiculous and is the type of thing that tends to ruin the experience.

All in all it was good and I had do it again. It was all of what I expected it to be. For a while I was worried when I was told there was a parking fee and no parking fee for everybody else. With all else throwing in the breakfast the balance scale became way off scale. I was not charged the parking I thought it was and that gave me a little bit of relief. The drinking glasses in the room upon arrival were dirty or used and have not been washed.

Excellent location for Six Flags lovely hotel. This is the best hotel to stay in for visiting Six Flags Magic Mountain. It costs 25 to park at the theme park but getting an Uber from the hotel cost just 4 5 so is definitely the better option. Valencia is lovely and the hotel is located in a beautiful area. Staff were really friendly and accommodating. Breakfast was delicious if a bit pricey at an extra 20p. The bed was big and comfortable and the shower was good. We could hear a bit of banging in our room a few times. We only stayed for two nights so I do not know how normal that is.
Exceptional. Staff is super friendly and helpful. Paying for the parking that is public and free.
great location beautiful hotel friendly staff all together. from Valet parking to waitress in restaurant.
They charge for parking but one part of their website says parking is complimentary. It Spears that it ’s a self parking garage that anyone can park in around the stores there.
